review: I purchased 3 of these to replace the Roku's I have the hard wired Amazon Fire TV in the living room and it works great. However, all these sticks are horrible. All three freeze-up constantly and buffers like its 1999 - I've had the Roku boxes hooked up and running all together and never a issue. Unfortunately for me I gave my Roku's away when I purchased these because of how awesome the hard wired Amazon Fire TV is - now I'm looking at buying some new Roku's - Amazon has the right-idea but lacking the technology with these - also boxed remote has no talk and text feature like the hard-wired model.
